website_summaries.verdict: The much-loved classic silhouette has just been given a makeover. The Reebok Classic Leather 2.0 features the soft and finest leather upper that keeps the feet at maximum comfort.The sharper angle and line accents play up the throwback feel that gives a superior street style. This kick is almost always on-point, from merely walking down to partying, and will help the wearer rock the perfect retro vibe.
pros: The Reebok Classic Leather 2.0 is available at an affordable price point
Few users applauded the multiple colorways available in the market
Most users felt comfortable while wearing the Reebok CL Leather 2.0
Many buyers praised the classic and stylish design of this sneaker
A handful of users commended the lightness of this pair
Numerous users noted about the soft natural leather on the upper of this shoe
One user liked the elastic band found on the sides of the tongue which prevents it from sliding to the side
This pair generally runs true to size
Some online buyers said that this pair looks better in the actual than online
One reviewer noted that the Classic Leather 2.0 is a good pair to be included in a collection of classic sneakers
Few users revealed that they highly recommend this pair to their friends
cons: One user complained that the tip of the shoe came off just after few uses
The Reebok Classic Leather 2.0 has poor arch support, criticized by some reviewers
Some griped that this pair runs tad narrow
They suggest grabbing a full size up for a more comfortable fit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad for xmas and he loved them! Fit perfectly size 11 1/2 true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Melea Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Wow I'm amazed of how nice these sneakers look
customer_reviews.text: Wow I'm amazed of how nice these sneakers look.i love anything that is navy blue and these sneakers matches with my navy blue shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Davila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with this purchase. Fit perfect and high quality as expected
customer_reviews.author: josue

customer_reviews.title: Just like back in the day
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple days to break in, but super comfy and a good price. I love that you can get these in lots of different colors. After I bought these, I bought a second pair right away. Thanks Reebok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reeboks men sneakers are excellent for women who have ankle problems
customer_reviews.text: Reeboks men sneakers are excellent for women who have ankle problems. I wear a size 12 women shoes. Reeboks also give me the toe room I need.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine W. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for cheap price cheap shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Does the fuel like a good Reebok shoes. Feels cheap with no support.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: The fit is good and they look great
customer_reviews.text: They were as expected. The fit is good and they look great! A very reasonable price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the old fashioned Reebok running shoe. this is it. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad and he loved them! The product fit as expected. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gisa Coellar

customer_reviews.title: I like em', soft supple and a deep royal blue
customer_reviews.text: I like em', soft supple and a deep royal blue. I was worried that they may have been too small since I usually look for a 12.5US, but these were spot on and not too small in the toe box at all.
customer_reviews.author: Grumps

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe,very nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly fit very nice nice cushion inside not too much but feels comfy .will recommend
customer_reviews.author: rodney montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneakers to wear at work
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneakers to wear at work , i will recommend it to buy this nice leather classic rebook
customer_reviews.author: renato faverio

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Classic Leather 2.0
product_meta.description: A classic is always on. On point. On time. AND in this case, on foot. Here, we've brought our iconic black classic leather back from 1983. Or have we you'll have to walk a few laps in these kicks first before you get to see them turn on their warmed-up, surprising side.
feature_bullets: Heat-sensitive material upper for comfortable support with a graphic surprise
Low-cut design for ankle mobility and an iconic silhouette
Die-cut EVA midsole for lightweight cushioning and stability
High abrasion rubber outsole for durability and traction
Black when cool, as the shoe warms it reveals a graphic story
